original_text: We did not want anyone to say that we are great people. We did not want you to do that, or anyone else.
korean_text: 또한 우리는 너희에게서든지 다른 이에게서든지 사람에게서는 영광을 구하지 아니하였노라

sentences.original_text: We did not want anyone to say
We did not want you to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 네가 그렇게 하기를 원하지 않았습니다
